newsitem.title: UK: BAA prices 175 mln stg convertible bond.
newsitem.headline: BAA prices 175 mln stg convertible bond.

text.p: BAA Plc's sterling convertible bond has been priced, joint lead managers J. Henry Schroder & Co Ltd and UBS Ltd said on Wednesday.
The conversion price was set at 672 pence stg per share, a 17.1 percent premium at the time of pricing.
The coupon was set at 4.875 percent, the bottom of the indicated 4.875-5.25 percent range.
The proceeds will be used to refinance in part BAA's acquisition of Duty Free International Inc.
